Detailed Description

static double edu.ou.asgbook.histogram.Entropy.computeEntropy ( Histogram  hist  )  [static] 

00017                                                        {
00018         float[] prob = hist.calcProb();
00019         double entropy = 0;
00020         for (int i=0; i < prob.length; ++i){
00021             if ( prob[i] > 0 ){
00022                 double plogp = prob[i] * Math.log(prob[i]);
00023                 entropy -= plogp;
00024             }
00025         }
00026         // to base 2
00027         return (entropy / Math.log(2.0));
00028     }

00030                                                             {
00031         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00032         Histogram hist = new Histogram(0, 100, 100 );
00033         hist.update(popdensity);
00034         double e1 = Entropy.computeEntropy(hist);
00035         System.out.println("Population density entropy = " + e1);
00036

00038         hist = new Histogram(0, 30, 30 );
00039         hist.update(albedo);
